properties.name: resetpassword.domain
properties.description: Domain name that will be used in reset password link.

properties.name: resetpassword.port
properties.description: Port that will be used in reset password link.

properties.name: resetpassword.email
properties.description: Email address for sending reset password letters.

properties.name: front.web.url
properties.description: Front-end application URL used for CORS configuration.
